verses.verse: ( You Are My Refuge and My Fortress) יֹ֭שֵׁב <WH3427> yō·šêḇ He who dwells בְּסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> bə·sê·ṯer in the shelter עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> ‘el·yō·wn of the Most High בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> bə·ṣêl in the shadow שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> day of the Almighty. ( Hebrew Shaddai) יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃ <WH3885> yiṯ·lō·w·nān will abide

אֹמַ֗ר <WH559> ’ō·mar I will say לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, מַחְסִ֣י <WH4268> maḥ·sî “ [You are] my refuge וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י <WH4686> ū·mə·ṣū·ḏā·ṯî and my fortress, אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hay my God, אֶבְטַח־ <WH982> ’eḇ·ṭaḥ- in whom I trust בּֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( bōw) . ”

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî Surely ה֣וּא <WH1931> hū He יַ֭צִּֽילְךָ <WH5337> yaṣ·ṣî·lə·ḵā will deliver you מִפַּ֥ח <WH6341> mip·paḥ from the snare יָק֗וּשׁ <WH3353> yā·qūš of the fowler, מִדֶּ֥בֶר <WH1698> mid·de·ḇer plague. הַוּֽוֹת׃ <WH1942> haw·wō·wṯ and from the deadly

בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ׀ <WH84> bə·’eḇ·rā·ṯōw with His feathers; יָ֣סֶךְ <WH5526> yā·seḵ He will cover לָ֭ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) you וְתַֽחַת־ 8478 Conj-w│Prep ( wə·ṯa·ḥaṯ-) under כְּנָפָ֣יו 3671 N-fpc│3ms ( kə·nā·p̄āw) His wings תֶּחְסֶ֑ה 2620 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( teḥ·seh) you will find refuge; צִנָּ֖ה 6793 N-fs ( ṣin·nāh) is a shield וְֽסֹחֵרָ֣ה 5507 Conj-w│N-fs ( wə·sō·ḥê·rāh) and rampart. אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ 571 N-fsc│3ms ( ’ă·mit·tōw) His faithfulness

לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- You will not תִ֭ירָא <WH3372> ṯî·rā fear מִפַּ֣חַד <WH6343> mip·pa·ḥaḏ the terror לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> lā·yə·lāh of the night, מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ <WH2671> mê·ḥêṣ nor the arrow יָע֥וּף <WH5774> yā·‘ūp̄ that flies יוֹמָֽם׃ <WH3119> yō·w·mām by day,

מִ֭דֶּבֶר <WH1698> mid·de·ḇer [nor] the pestilence בָּאֹ֣פֶל <WH652> bā·’ō·p̄el in the darkness, יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> ya·hă·lōḵ that stalks מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב <WH6986> miq·qe·ṭeḇ [nor] the calamity יָשׁ֥וּד <WH7736> yā·šūḏ that destroys צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> ṣā·ho·rā·yim at noon.

יִפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> yip·pōl may fall מִצִּדְּךָ֨׀ <WH6654> miṣ·ṣid·də·ḵā at your side, אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> ’e·lep̄ Though a thousand וּרְבָבָ֥ה <WH7233> ū·rə·ḇā·ḇāh and ten thousand מִימִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> mî·mî·ne·ḵā at your right hand, אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> ’ê·le·ḵā will come near לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō no [harm] יִגָּֽשׁ׃ <WH5066> yig·gāš you.

רַ֭ק <WH7535> raq You will only בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> bə·‘ê·ne·ḵā with your eyes תַבִּ֑יט <WH5027> ṯab·bîṭ see it וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת <WH8011> wə·šil·lu·maṯ the punishment רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> rə·šā·‘îm of the wicked. תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> tir·’eh and witness

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- Because אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ’at·tāh you יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD מַחְסִ֑י <WH4268> maḥ·sî my refuge, עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> ‘el·yō·wn the Most High — שַׂ֣מְתָּ <WH7760> śam·tā have made מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <WH4583> mə·‘ō·w·ne·ḵā your dwelling —

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- no תְאֻנֶּ֣ה <WH579> ṯə·’un·neh will befall אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> ’ê·le·ḵā you, רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> rā·‘āh evil וְ֝נֶ֗גַע <WH5061> wə·ne·ḡa‘ plague לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- no יִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> yiq·raḇ will approach בְּאָהֳלֶֽךָ׃ <WH168> bə·’ā·ho·le·ḵā your tent.

כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî For מַ֭לְאָכָיו <WH4397> mal·’ā·ḵāw His angels יְצַוֶּה־ <WH6680> yə·ṣaw·weh- He will command לָּ֑ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) concerning you לִ֝שְׁמָרְךָ֗ 8104 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf│2ms ( liš·mā·rə·ḵā) to guard you בְּכָל־ 3605 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·ḵāl) in all דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ 1870 N-cpc│2ms ( də·rā·ḵe·ḵā) your ways.

עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- in כַּפַּ֥יִם <WH3709> kap·pa·yim their hands, יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ <WH5375> yiś·śā·’ū·nə·ḵā They will lift you up פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- so that you will not תִּגֹּ֖ף <WH5062> tig·gōp̄ strike בָּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> bā·’e·ḇen against a stone. ( Cited in and ) רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH7272> raḡ·le·ḵā your foot

עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on שַׁ֣חַל <WH7826> ša·ḥal the lion וָפֶ֣תֶן <WH6620> wā·p̄e·ṯen and cobra; תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ <WH1869> tiḏ·rōḵ You will tread תִּרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> tir·mōs you will trample כְּפִ֣יר <WH3715> kə·p̄îr the young lion וְתַנִּֽין׃ <WH8577> wə·ṯan·nîn and serpent.

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî “ Because בִ֣י Prep│1cs ( ḇî) Me, חָ֭שַׁק 2836 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ḥā·šaq) he loves וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ 6403 Conj-w│V-Piel-ConjImperf-1cs│3ms ( wa·’ă·p̄al·lə·ṭê·hū) I will deliver him; אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ 7682 V-Piel-Imperf-1cs│3ms ( ’ă·śag·gə·ḇê·hū) I will protect him. כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) because יָדַ֥ע 3045 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( yā·ḏa‘) he knows שְׁמִֽי׃ 8034 N-msc│1cs ( šə·mî) My name,

יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי׀ <WH7121> yiq·rā·’ê·nî When he calls out to Me, וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ <WH6030> wə·’e·‘ĕ·nê·hū I will answer him; עִמּֽוֹ־ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw- will be with him אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî I בְצָרָ֑ה <WH6869> ḇə·ṣā·rāh in trouble. אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ <WH2502> ’ă·ḥal·lə·ṣê·hū I will deliver him וַֽאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃ <WH3513> wa·’ă·ḵab·bə·ḏê·hū and honor him.

אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> ’ō·reḵ With long יָ֭מִים <WH3117> yā·mîm life אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ <WH7646> ’aś·bî·‘ê·hū I will satisfy him וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ <WH7200> wə·’ar·’ê·hū and show him בִּֽישׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> bî·šū·‘ā·ṯî My salvation. ”
